text: Kabaka wa Isirayiri n’addamu Yekosafaati nti, “Wakyaliyo omusajja omu gwe tuyinza okwebuuzaako eri Mukama erinnya lye ye Mikaaya22:8 Mikaaya oluusi ayitibwa Mikka. Kyokka si y’omu ne nnabbi eyawandiika ekitabo kya Mikka. mutabani wa Imula naye namukyawa kubanga tewali kirungi ky’alagula ku nze, wabula ebibi.”
